scripts.devtest: npm run prepare && cp -R ./src/* ./public/ && rm ./public/script.js && cp ./src/script.js ./private/ && node index.js
scripts.build: npm run prepare && cp -R ./src/* ./public && rm ./public/script.js && uglifycss ./src/style.css --output ./public/style.css && uglifyjs ./src/script.js --compress --mangle --warn --output ./private/script.js
scripts.dockerbuild: rm -rf ./home-tab-bookmark.tar && npm run build && docker build -t dannystudio/home-tab-bookmark .
